title: AI needs power desperately. Here’s how to invest in companies profiting from the pain.
description: The shortage is a lucrative opportunity — but the window is brief.
content:
AI computing workloads could consume around 500 terawatt-hours annually by 2027 about twice the U.K.s total electricity consumption in 2023. - Getty Images
